sentence: Charles Wright (born August 25, 1935) is an American poet.
From 2014 to 2015, he served as the 50th Poet Laureate of the United States.
Wright was born in Pickwick Dam, Tennessee.

Wright attended Christ School (North Carolina) in Asheville for his junior and senior years where he helped coach football, served as vice president of his class, and became a member of the honors program.

Wright has published two works of criticism, Halflife and Quarter Notes.
